summary: Texture of the Dragonbone armor to match with Skyrim climate.
descriptionHtml:
====================================
Andrej12 Dragonbone Armor
====================================
Author: Andrej12

Version: 1

10th January 2012

1. Introduction
2. Installation

===============
1. INTRODUCTION
===============
This mod will give you a new texture of Dragonbone armor to match the Skyrim climate.
MALE ONLY
You can use this texture where you want and how you want but credit me if you do.
==================
2. Installation
==================
Copy the textures map to you Skyrim data folder.
author: Andrej12
